summary: Killswitch Engage is an American metalcore band from Westfield, Massachusetts, formed in 1999. The band consists of five members and has released eight studio albums, with their latest, "Atonement," coming out in 2019. Their 2004 album, "The End of Heartache," was a big success, reaching number 21 on the Billboard 200 and winning a Grammy nomination. Killswitch Engage has played at many famous music festivals and sold over four million records in the U.S. They are known for helping to start the metalcore genre and are part of the New Wave of American Heavy Metal.
title: Killswitch Engage
